short_summary: The Correctional Service of Canada, Pacific Region – Fraser Valley Institution requires Dental Services.
description: This requirement is for The Correctional Service of Canada, Pacific Region – Fraser Valley Institution. The Contractor must provide dental services to inmates and collaborate with the institution’s multi-disciplinary health services team, including Nurses, Institutional Physicians, Psychologists, Dieticians, and other allied health professionals. Deliverables by the Contractor: Provide and coordinate essential dental services to inmates. Deliverables include dental treatments, radiographies, emergencies, and promotion of oral health in accordance with provincial standards and policies, National Essential Health Services Framework. Requirements also include consulting with the Chief Health Services regarding requirements for dental supplies and equipment; alongside providing backup personnel and supervision of dental assistants.

### Government Tender Announcement
#### Document Title: Dental Services - Fraser Valley Institution

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Region:** British Columbia, Canada

**Region of Delivery:** British Columbia, Canada

**Notice Date:** 2022-10-19
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-08T16:00:00
**Tender Status:** Expired

**Brief Description:**

The Correctional Service of Canada is seeking a qualified contractor to provide dental services to the inmates at the Fraser Valley Institution in British Columbia. The contractor will work collaboratively with the institution's health services team to provide essential dental care to the inmates.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Provide dental services to inmates, including radiography and promotion of oral health
* Coordinate care with dental specialists as required
* Supervise dental assistants and ensure continuity of care
* Maintain accurate records of all dental assessments, treatments, and consultations

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Technical skills and experience in providing dental services to inmates
* Ability to collaborate with the health services team
* Demonstrated knowledge of provincial and federal dental standards and policies

**Additional Information:**

* Estimated quantity of commodity: See solicitation document
* Duration of contract: April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024 (with option to renew for two additional one-year periods)
* Trade agreement: This procurement is not subject to any trade agreement
* Security requirements: This contract includes security requirements

**Vendor Information:**

* Contact person: Amber Hupper
* Email: [Amber.Hupper@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:Amber.Hupper@csc-scc.gc.ca)
